comments:
The problem seems to be that somebody is calling TextEdit#adjustLength(int),
such that fLength becomes 0. In my case, the TextEdit already had (deleted)
children. Setting the fLength to 0 without removing the children breaks the
TextEdit's well-formedness.

I could make it run by adding ...
    if (fLength == 0)
        fChildren= null;
... to TextEdit#adjustLength(int).

Please tell me if you need more info about my (uncommitted) code which leads to
the problem.
